name: ORBEAT: Pop Asteroids On Beat
description:
Get ready to pop asteroids on beat and match colors in time in this twitchy rhythm-based space arcade game. It's time to put your skills to the test!

THE MISSION: Destroy as many asteroids as possible – before they destroy you!

THE TWIST: To gain points, you must match their colors!

Conquer the never-ending stream of neon asteroids stuck in orbit:
– Let the ever-increasing difficulty push you beyond your limits while you're pushing for the highscore!

How long will you last?

GAMEPLAY
Match your lasers with the incoming asteroids to get the highest possible score – before going out with a colorful bang!

GAME MODES
• One-Handed Aiming
• One-Handed Matching
• Two-Handed Coordination (Normal & Extreme)

FEATURES
• Feel the asteroids POP through haptic feedback
• Start unlimited combos and recover by matching 10 times in a row
• Restore broken shields by matching 5 times in a row
• Compare your score against other Neon Pilots

Good luck out there, future Neon Pilot!

We hope you'll enjoy our first game!

/Childhood friends Max & Sebastian
